frontmatter.description: This lesson serves as an introduction to the SOLID Architecture Principles, going over when and how to implement them, in a multiple-choice quiz format. The tone is conversational: you will be guided towards why an answer is correct or incorrect as you select the different options.
frontmatter.title: SOLID Principles Part 1

readingLinks.title: SOLID Principles- What are they and why projects should use them

readingLinks.description: This paper originated the SOLID principles.
readingLinks.title: “Design Principles and Design Patterns” by Robert C. Martin
